author: Sachin Dave
title: CXOs, cos rush to modify ESOP terms to include Covid realities
description: Compensation and vesting rights depend on targets that may not be achieved due to virus.
content:
Mumbai: Senior executives in some of the top listed Indian entities, unicorn start-ups and private equity (PE) backed companies who earn millions in employee stock option plan (ESOP) are all set to see their earnings go down drastically due to Coronavirus.
